Methods
Description | Constants Methods (details)
get (line 33)

getter method, basically same as offsetGet(), except if the key is not specified, then the entire registry is returned (iterable).

  • access: public
mixed get ([$index $index = null])
  • $index $index: - OPTIONAL get the value associated with $index
